input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 screwdriver is a versatile tool that comes with interchangeable bits for multiple uses. The chrome/nickel plating on the product ensures that it lasts longer and can withstand heavy use. The industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished to provide excellent durability and precision. The product is also easy to use and can be stored easily. With its numerous features, the Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 screwdriver is a must-have tool for anyone who needs a reliable and versatile tool.
input_text.Response B:
on a black background
Durable and long-lasting

Great for any weather conditions
Makes a great gift for friends and family
Easy to clean and maintain

Adds a decorative touch to your front porch
Available in a variety of colors and designs
Hand-crafted in India using traditional techniques

What inspired the design of this doormat?
The design of this doormat was inspired by the beautiful poppies that bloom in the gardens around the artist's home in India. The artist wanted to capture the vibrant colors and intricate details of the flowers and bring them to life in a durable and functional doormat.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
